message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you. This product has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it is worth $1,200,000. We hope this offer aligns well with your valuation and budget.
Alice, I appreciate your offer.  However, given my budget and the market value of similar products, I'm only able to offer $950,000 at this time.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of our product. In light of that, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,075,000. This amount still allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin while being more flexible within your budget constraints.
